Text:
OMG! you have no idea how much thankful I am with you for this torrent! :D Thanks a lot!! Is it too much if I ask if you have any plan for future torrents of some the "old school" jewels such as Ultima? If that would be the case I take the chance to ask if you have any of these titles: Lands of Lore, Shadowcaster or Anvil of Dawn?
Thanks again!:D
